verbs.description: A heightened level of presidential urgency [V: is] spurring discussions among American and North Korean counterparts two weeks ahead of an off - again , on - again summit between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un .

[ARG2: A heightened level of presidential urgency] is [V: spurring] [ARG1: discussions among American and North Korean counterparts] [ARGM-TMP: two weeks ahead of an off - again , on - again summit between President Donald Trump and Kim Jong Un] .
